original: 「此人不可屈致，大人可親自前往。若得此人，就有如周文王得姜子牙、劉邦得張良。此人複姓諸葛，名亮，字孔明。」
text: 'This person is not to be averted. Adults can go in person. If you get this person, you will be like Zhou Wenwang who got Jiang Ziya and Liu Bang got Zhang Liang. This person has the surname Zhuge, the name is bright, and the name is Kongming.'
